Havit

Korean: 하빛

Hometown:

Incheon, South Korea

Full name:
Lee Ha vit

이하빛
Birthday:
Jun 7, 1999
Age:
25 years old
Group (2021-present):
TRENDZ

Introduction

Havit is a singer under Interpark Music Plus. He is a member of the boy group TRENDZ.

In late 2017, Havit participated in the JTBC reality show MIXNINE as a trainee from NH Media. Unfortunately, he was eliminated in the 10th episode, which was aired on December 31, with his final rank being 39th.

Havit debuted as a member of TRENDZ on January 5, 2022 with their first mini album "Blue Set Chapter 1. Tracks."
